name: Space Run (itch) (modking09)
description:
You are stranded after a space battle! With your ships warp core unstable harvest supplies from nearby small ships and asteroids to gain enough power to pass through the Warp Gate!

The Warp gates might be hard to find so look out for giant rings in space!

Controls:

W/S: Move Forward/ Backwards

A/D: Strafe

Q/E: Roll

Shift: Thrust!

Space/Ctril: Up and Down

Pivot with Mouse movement (might 

need to increase mouse sensitivity)

Left Mouse Button: Shoot
